main event: On December 6, 1957, a UFO sighting was reported in Chattanooga, Tennessee, involving a bright object observed moving from west to east at high speed before hovering for several minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared larger than the full moon at the time of observation., The altitude of the object was believed to be great., The sighting lasted approximately 5 to 7 minutes., Capt. James O. Smith corroborated the sighting., The observer noted unusual conditions at the observation site.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: Capt. John Fugitt and Capt. James O. Smith, both military personnel.
